title: Something went wrong
description: The application encountered an unexpected error. You can help us improve AniStream by sending a crash report. We value your privacy: no personal information is sent, only the technical details shown below.
additionalInfo: If you have any additional information about what happened, please describe it below (preferably in English):
placeholder: e.g. What were you doing when the error occurred?
restartNote: Please restart the application to ensure it continues to function correctly, regardless of whether you choose to send this report.
